00060 // ripped from wxWindows
00061 
00062 // _declspec works in BC++ 5 and later, as well as VC++
00063 #if defined(__VISUALC__) || defined(__BORLANDC__) || defined(__GNUC__)
00064 #  ifdef XBMAKINGDLL
00065 #    define XBDLLEXPORT __declspec( dllexport )
00066 #    define XBDLLEXPORT_DATA(type) __declspec( dllexport ) type
00067 #    define XBDLLEXPORT_CTORFN
00068 #  elif defined(XBUSINGDLL)
00069 #    define XBDLLEXPORT __declspec( dllimport )
00070 #    define XBDLLEXPORT_DATA(type) __declspec( dllimport ) type
00071 #    define XBDLLEXPORT_CTORFN
00072 #  else
00073 #    define XBDLLEXPORT
00074 #    define XBDLLEXPORT_DATA(type) type
00075 #    define XBDLLEXPORT_CTORFN
00076 #  endif
00077 
00078 #else
00079 
00080 #  define XBDLLEXPORT
00081 #  define XBDLLEXPORT_DATA(type) type
00082 #  define XBDLLEXPORT_CTORFN
00083 #endif
00084 
00085 #else // !Windows
00086 #  define XBDLLEXPORT
00087 #  define XBDLLEXPORT_DATA(type) type
00088 #  define XBDLLEXPORT_CTORFN
00089 #endif // Win/!Win

00124 #define XB_MIN(a, b)    (((a) < (b)) ? (a) : (b))

00149 class XBDLLEXPORT xbXBase {
00150  public:
00151   ~xbXBase();
00152   xbXBase();
00153   xbShort  AddDbfToDbfList(xbDbf *d, const char *DatabaseName);
00154   xbDbf *  GetDbfPtr( const char *Name );
00155   xbShort  DirectoryExistsInName( const char *Name );
00156   xbShort  GetEndianType() { return EndianType; }
00157   void     DisplayError( xbShort ErrorCode ) const;
00158   static const char* GetErrorMessage( xbShort ErrorCode );
00159   xbString & GetDefaultDateFormat() { return DefaultDateFormat; }
00160   void     SetDefaultDateFormat( const xbString & f ){ DefaultDateFormat = f; }
00161 
00162   /* next 6 routines handle both big endian and little endian machines */
00163   xbDouble GetDouble( const char *p );
00164   xbLong   GetLong  ( const char *p );
00165   xbULong  GetULong ( const char *p );
00166   xbShort  GetShort ( const char *p );
00167   xbULong GetHBFULong( const char *p );
00168   xbShort GetHBFShort ( const char *p );
00169 
00170   void   PutLong  ( char *p, const xbLong   l );
00171   void   PutShort ( char *p, const xbShort  s );
00172   void   PutULong ( char *p, const xbULong  l );
00173   void   PutUShort( char *p, const xbUShort s );
00174   void   PutDouble( char *p, const xbDouble d );
00175 
00176   xbShort  RemoveDbfFromDbfList( xbDbf * );
00177 
00178 #ifdef XB_LOCKING_ON
00179   xbShort  GetLockRetryCount(){ return LockRetryCount; }
00180   void     SetLockRetryCount( xbShort lrc ) { LockRetryCount = lrc; }
00181   xbShort  LockFile( int fn, xbShort type, xbOffT len );
00182   xbShort  GetLockMode() { return LockMode; }
00183   xbShort  SetLockMode( xbShort nlm );
00184 #endif
00185 
00186 protected:
00187   xbDbList * DbfList;
00188   xbDbList * FreeDbfList;
00189   xbShort    EndianType;          /* B = Big Endian, L = Little Endian */
00190 
00191 private:
00192   xbString DefaultDateFormat;
00193   
00194 #ifdef XB_LOCKING_ON
00195   xbShort LockRetryCount;
00196   xbShort LockMode;
00197 #endif
00198 };
